name: mindpm
description: Gives LLMs a SQLite-backed brain for your projects. Tracks tasks, decisions, notes, and session context so every new conversation picks up exactly where you left off. Includes a built-in Kanban board.

MINDPM_DB_PATH.description: Path to the SQLite database file

MINDPM_PORT.description: Port for the built-in Kanban board UI

claude_mcp_add: claude mcp add mindpm -e MINDPM_DB_PATH=~/.mindpm/memory.db -- npx -y mindpm
